alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 20 at 1:49PM CST until January 21 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 degrees below zero. For the Winter Storm Watch, significant icing possible. Total ice accumulations of one quarter of an inch to one half of an inch is possible. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE: Portions of northern Arkansas. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 12 AM Sunday to 9 AM CST Sunday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...|A Winter Storm Watch is issued when there is the potential of significant and hazardous winter weather within 48 hours. With this winter storm, there could be enough ice accumulation to cause damage to trees and powerlines.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
